long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just a simple little chrome extension I made for people who work at JB Hi-Fi in Australia. When installed in Chrome and on the JB Hi-Fi website, the useless invisible PLU will be converted into a barcode that is scannable on PDA's, saving time by not having to type in the SKU into Onstage. A Product App button will also appear allowing for easy inventory query's.
